( BB: Hopefully I replied to everyone�s post who reacted to Rage, if not, 
just mail me and I�ll see what I can do.)

: Rage was almost on top of her victim, her mouth open and ready to bite 
down on the one who had caused the numbness in her neck.
Her jaws were inches away from DevilDuer when he suddenly rolled to the 
side, another bolt of that numbing stuff(charge) striking her in the chest.
She roared and took a step back in surprise, shaking her head to try and get 
the numbing away as the same feeling grew and spread along her chest.
It was all very weird, never experiencing anything like this before.
A cloud of dirt erupting in front of her from some other shooter(Scorpina)
But then suddenly something forced her head back to the side with a jolt of 
pain and engulfed it in a fireball, suddenly jolting her out of her brief 
concerns of the numbness and jarring her back to reality.
She roared in pain and surprise as the fire died away, leaving her entire 
cheek and half her jaw bleeding and exposed, cybertronic wires hanging from 
the wound.
Rages� head hung for a moment as her eyes moved in the direction the shot 
had come from, leaving them to fall upon a bot that she didn�t know the 
name�but was Zardus.
Her head slowly lifted but towards DevilDuer, but her eyes still on Zardus, 
eyeing him from a side view.
The breathing from the female Allos (Allosaurus) raged and heavy, the temper 
which she was named after rising until she finally turned her head towards 
Zardus with a swiftness that would leave a bullet to shame�an earth shaking 
roar erupting from her throat as she charged.
Rage watched as Zardus raised his gun to shoot again but simply side stepped 
in mid-stride and avoided the charge, her huge body continuing to thunder 
towards him.
But then suddenly something rather flat and brown skittered into her view, 
her head ducking and her body swerving to the side to avoid the poisonous 
tail.
She snapped large head towards the smaller thing that swung it�s tail back 
and forth in front of her, her eyes glued to the purple ooze that slimed out 
of the tip.
Rage had never seen anything like this creature before, but it had surprised 
her and was of a fair size(Scorpina.)
Could it be taken down easily? By the way it swung its tail it seemed as if 
no, but there was always a way.
However, even as she watched this creature something moving caught her 
attention, besides the moving tail of the scorpion.
It was another of those 2 legged things, only slimmer and faster.( Feline)
Rage snapped her head and twisted her body in it�s direction as it 
approached quickly, her neck sweeping forward and her jaws opening 
wide�coming inches towards the creatures middle.
This wasn�t a simple voyage of curiosity anymore, it was life and death�and 
she had no intent of dying!
These things that swarmed out of the metal structure were like ants, savage 
and quick to defend.
But she was surrounded by these things and couldn�t get away, so she had no 
choice but to fight and protect herself.*
